Chirp from John Coene is a free, open-source, and easy to use Twitter network visualisation built in R!


Intuitive

Chirp is easy to use, look for tweet or load your file to get your network.



Insightful

A simple but powerful visualisation to understand Twitter conversations.



Local or Deployed

Use it locally or deploy it on a server for anyone to use.

Free

Chirp is free, what's not to like?.

Open-source

Chirp is open-source, you are welcome to contribute and improve it.

Easy to Setup

It only takes three lines of code to setup Chirp.
